lessons.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to OS Development
lessons.content: Welcome to the first lesson. You will start by learning a few estils about the pc. The few major things you will need to know are about the cpu, the bios, the ram and the storage drive.

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Knowing the boot process
lessons.content: In this lesson, you will learn the typical boot process of an x86 system.

lessons.title: Lesson 3: Knowing the boot process
lessons.content: In this lesson, you will learn the typical boot process of an x86 system.
